title: Help identifying typefaces
content:
I'm in a diploma in writing and publishing and am taking a class on letterpress printing. One of our assignments was to clean and identify some type cases. These are two type samples that I can't identify. I've already tried what the font and have looked through a lot of books and have come up with nothing. Similar types will not work in this case as I need to know the exact name of the type. Any help will be greatly appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [s002.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819014322/http:/typophile.com/files/s002.jpg) | 353.18 KB |
| [s003.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819014322/http:/typophile.com/files/s003.jpg) | 668.61 KB |
author: shvaugn

comments.content: you might want to visit previous thread on a similar topic, [http://www.typophile.com/node/92153\node 92153](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819014322/http:/www.typophile.com/node/92153/node%2092153) for the first image.
thank you. I've got the first image identified now.
